Text: Sad. When a girl's only hope lies between her legs, and man falls for it everytime. What is life without something left sacred?

@Delron41 Life is whatever you want it to be.  If you need to put sex on a pedestal for your life to have meaning, I think you should pull your head out of your ass.

Granted, fixating on it may be inane, but going to the opposite extreme is just as bad.
